name: Power Loom 3D
description:
Power Loom 3D is an application that simulates the functioning of a mechanical loom using the physics engine of Unity. This application provides an intuitive and user-friendly interface that allows users to observe the complex movements of a loom in a simplified and visually engaging manner.

This application provides an immersive 3D environment that enables users to interact with a virtual loom and learn how it works in a realistic way.
